overview: This new story of Ulysses and the sex-filled affairs while he was away has everything to tantalize the senses. From hot sex with nymphs in the fields, to Greek Gods seducing women and hot orgies in the throne rooms, the world of Ulysses is seductive and enchanting. The gorgeous babes provide plenty of scenery and love to please their viewers and themselves.
title: The Sexual Adventures of Ulysses
